messages.title: Fortnitemares
messages.body: Vlads back at it again and we need your help to send him back to his “eternal” slumber! Complete these bone chilling events to unlock your fair share of Candy, Gold, and Heroes.

messages.title: Hexsylvania
messages.body: Go on your next great Venture in the Hexsylvania Zone! Commanders can re-experience leveling and resource progression as they climb to the top of each new Ventures Season!
